about_the_game:
The Final Farewell is a cosy narrative adventure where you play as a lonely ghost. Among the shadows and echoes of the Whispering Woods, a misty Veil has fallen. Rumours abound of lost mortals who’ve had their memories stolen by the mist, and precious trinkets lie in wait, ready to be found…


You’ve awoken to find you have no memory of your past - and you’re a ghost! How did you come to pass? Memories once lost are not gone forever… Can you discover the clues of your former life and finally be at peace?





Seek out lost mortals who have come to lay their loved ones to rest. The misty Veil wipes their memories each time they venture into its murky haze, so it’s up to you to help locate forgotten trinkets.



Stay close to the light of campfires to lift your spirits and avoid the dangerous mist of the Veil. There are many secrets to be found in the Woods - but do you dare take the time to look? Spend too long, and the Veil will close in before you can return to your new mortal friend!



Inspect and identify precious belongings to see if you can assist in triggering a memory or two! As each mortal recalls their past, they grow one step closer to putting their loved one to rest - and saying goodbye forever.





A landing place for spirits, the Solstice Shrine is your force of teleportation to the Whispering Woods. In the safety of the Shrine, you can recharge and guide mortals to bid their loved ones adieu.



Unlock spiritual assistance as you complete each mortal’s story, allowing you to tackle the Veil with an extra advantage. Whether with a dash of light, or an encouraging word, each ghostly entity can help you find precious trinkets and uncover new memories!

content_descriptors.notes: Themes include death, grief & implied suicide.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Final Farewell is a cosy narrative adventure about finding peace in death, and learning to let go. As a lost ghost, befriend wayward mortals and piece together misty memories. Lay to rest the echoes of the past and discover the truth of your own demise.
